title: Include Cleanup Configuration
description: Configuration settings for use with include cleanup scripts

.*.description: Path to dependency in the source tree

oneOf.description: Path to another config file to include

includeDirs.description: A list of include directories to use when processing this codebase. Paths to dependencies are automatically added to this list.

ignores.description: Known inaccurate output which should be ignored

skip.description: This is a list of filenames to skip entirely, for situations like when clangd infers a bad compile command

add.description: Ignores for suggestions to add includes

filenames.description: This is a list of known filenames to skip when suggesting includes to add.

headers.description: This is a list of known headers where clangd produces a false positive when suggesting as includes to add.

edges.description: This is a list of known edges where clangd produces a false positive when suggesting as an include to add.

remove.description: Ignores for suggestions to remove includes

filenames.description: This is a list of known filenames to skip when suggesting unused includes. It's mostly a list of umbrella headers where the includes will appear to clangd to be unused, but are meant to be included.

headers.description: This is a list of known headers where clangd produces a false positive when suggesting as unused includes to remove. Usually these are umbrella headers, or headers where clangd thinks the canonical location for a symbol is actually in a forward declaration, causing it to flag the correct header as unused everywhere.

edges.description: This is a list of known edges where clangd produces a false positive when suggesting as unused includes to remove.
